# Scott Berrevoets

This site contains writing by Scott Berrevoets about iOS development, architecture, testing, and software engineering.

Canonical site: https://scottberrevoets.com

Primary entrypoints:
- https://scottberrevoets.com/sitemap.xml
- https://scottberrevoets.com/feeds/all.atom.xml
- https://scottberrevoets.com/blog.html
- https://scottberrevoets.com/llms-full.txt

Machine-readable content:
- Blog posts are available in Markdown at each post's canonical path with a `.md` suffix.
